documents.document: .@Mascherano: “How beautiful would it be to become Messi for five seconds, just to see what it feels like.” #ThankYouMasche https://t.co/b97S7xka61
.@RayHudson: “Centipedes go to bed at night dreaming of just one left leg like his.” https://t.co/oxUrIq1DGn
.@Mascherano: “He competes against himself. He seems more like a golfer than a footballer — every day he is trying to lower his handicap.” #ThankYouMasche https://t.co/FA8dhIxYw1
.@Mascherano: “Every time Messi touches the ball, you know something is going to happen — he's the only player with that capability.” #ThankYouMasche https://t.co/ZhxOVlLzER
.@Mascherano: “If we want to do something big at the @FIFAWorldCup it will depend on Leo's contribution.” #ThankYouMasche https://t.co/XLtVzwhSy6
.@Mascherano: “He’s a footballing assassin, he goes onto the pitch to collect his victims.” #ThankYouMasche https://t.co/zm1RPm8GIB
.@Mascherano: “Football controls all of us, but Messi controls football.” #ThankYouMasche https://t.co/KE3YhvbP22
.@mattletiss7: “Messi is on a different planet.” https://t.co/rpI9dk40YN

.@RayHudson [on Leo's 146th @LaLiga assist]: “The love affair continues between these two. A better combination than Lennon and McCartney. Magnificent from Suárez but it's all down to the magic man. .@madurohedwiges: “We are living in the Messi era. He's the best player in the world, without any doubt! It's a great honour that I was given the chance to play against him — I really mean it. In fact, every football fan must watch a live match of his. He's unbelievable!” https://t.co/eSJvwp9AQ8

RT @MessiQuote: .@TheTweetOfGod: “The laws of physics I created do not apply to Lionel Messi.”
.@MessiStats_: “Messi has now scored 532 official goals for @FCBarcelona. That's 300 more than previous record holder, César Rodríguez Álvarez.” https://t.co/OXhS4A0eq5

Ernesto Valverde: “I applaud what he does and I hope the crowd enjoys and will remember what he does. We are fortunate to be around while the best is playing. It's a pleasure to have him with us. He's the best there is and the best there has ever been.” https://t.co/4t7dzNz1AM
.@MattDoyle76: “It's incredible how thoroughly Messi has broken expectations of what's possible.” https://t.co/a3v4GTKkfT

.@GaryLineker [on Leo's goal that broke Gerd Müller's record of 365 league goals in a single top 5 European league]: “Messi has just scored with a most ridiculous free-kick. He plays a game that mere mortals couldn’t even dream of playing.” https://t.co/QP9PdVpQVt

.@10Ronaldinho: “Being part of your story is very rewarding — seeing you create history is with great pride. You've conquered us all with your humility and talent. You're awesome!” https://t.co/ewbBZNHxVQ
.@sidlowe: “Said it before, but all the goals, assists, dribbles and all that stuff hid Messi's passing.”
#CopaBarça #EspanyolBarça #Messi https://t.co/PLIm1But93

.@RayHudson: “If curiosity killed the cat, I bet ya Ronaldinho was a suspect. Ronnie killed it every time I saw him play! Poets of the game like him, Riquelme, Messi, Diego, Fenômeno, Zico, Garrincha, Neymar, Romario, they arrow ya football heart like Cupid—with a whale harpoon!”

Leo Messi: “...as well as being a star out on the pitch, you're an excellent person and that's the most important thing. Although you've decided to retire, football will never forget your smile. Wishing you all the best, @10Ronaldinho.” (2/2) https://t.co/0LnoEUGvRS

Leo Messi: “As I've always said, I learned a lot by your side. I'll forever be grateful to you for making everything so easy when I joined the first team. I was lucky enough to share many things with you and I'm really happy about that because... (1/2)
.@Tony_Watt7: “Because of Messi, we don’t appreciate really how good @10Ronaldinho was 💥👌🏼. That guy could do things with a rolled up fag packet that I couldn’t do with a ball 🤣😢.”

Xabi Prieto: “I have gone to the Bernabéu just to watch Messi play. I had never seen him from the stands before. Facing him on the pitch he impresses you, however, watching him from the stands you appreciate him even more. It's a delight every time he touches the ball.” https://t.co/6vXUtnSmm8
